name: wsl-open
description: Utility for opening files from the Windows Subsystem for Linux (WSL) in native Windows applications
author: August Valera

scripts.test: for test in lint unit; do npm run $test; done
scripts.lint: for lint in md sh pkg; do npm run lint:$lint; done
scripts.man: for man in gen install; do npm run man:$man; done
scripts.man:install:
File=wsl-open.1; sed 's/\"/\\\"/g' $File >$File.swp; Begin=".\" IMPORT $File"; End=".\" END IMPORT $File"; sed -i "/$Begin/,/$End/{ /$Begin/{p; r $File.swp
}; /$End/p; d }" wsl-open.sh; rm -f $File.swp
